text: Why can’t see short sell now in sgx website

Alibaba and Tencent preparing to cut tens of thousands of jobs combined: SourcesMarch 16  2022 4:48 PMThese would be the first major layoffs since China launched a sweeping crackdown on its tech giants.Read more:https://bit.ly/3tdlBdg

At close to mid-day  the HSI is up 2.3% and CSI300 is up 0.5%. Here are some reasons why there has been a slight bounce in Chinese stocks:- China reported 1 860 new local symptomatic cases on 15 Mar  down from 3 507 the previous day- Chinese ambassador to the US wrote in a commentary in the Washington Post that “assertions that China knew about  acquiesced to or tacitly supported this war are purely disinformation”- This follows Chinese denial of claims by US officials that Russia had sought its military assistance in Ukraine.In understanding the direction of Chinese stocks  we could  look out for developments around geopolitical risk  covid risk and regulatory risk. It seems like the news above has provided some optimism around 2 of the 3 risks.
